title: 2 Month Questionnaire
/COMMUNICATION/questions/0/question: Does your baby sometimes make throaty or gurgling sounds?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/1/question: Does your baby make cooing sounds such as “ooo,” “gah,” and “aah”?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/2/question: When you speak to your baby, does she make sounds back to you?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/3/question: Does your baby smile when you talk to him?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/5/question: After you have been out of sight, does your baby smile or get excited when she sees you?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/0/question: While your baby is on his back, does he wave his arms and legs, wiggle, and squirm?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/1/question: When your baby is on her tummy, does she turn her head to the side?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/2/question: When your baby is on his tummy, does he hold his head up longer than a few seconds?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/3/question: When your baby is on her back, does she kick her legs?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/4/question: While your baby is on his back, does he move his head from side to side?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/5/question: After holding her head up while on her tummy, does your baby lay her head back down on the floor, rather than let it drop or fall forward?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/0/question: Is your baby’s hand usually tightly closed when he is awake? (If your baby used to do this but no longer does, mark “yes.”)
/FINE MOTOR/questions/1/question: Does your baby grasp your finger if you touch the palm of her hand?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/2/question: When you put a toy in his hand, does your baby hold it in his hand briefly?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/3/question: Does your baby touch her face with her hands?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/4/question: Does your baby hold his hands open or partly open when he is awake (rather than in fists, as they were when he was a newborn)?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/5/question: Does your baby grab or scratch at her clothes?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/0/question: Does your baby look at objects that are 8–10 inches away?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/1/question: When you move around, does your baby follow you with his eyes?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/2/question: When you move a toy slowly from side to side in front of your baby’s face (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with her eyes, sometimes turning her head?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/3/question: When you move a small toy up and down slowly in front of your baby’s face (about 10 inches away), does your baby follow the toy with his eyes?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/4/question: When you hold your baby in a sitting position, does she look at a toy (about the size of a cup or rattle) that you place on the table or floor in front of her?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/5/question: When you dangle a toy above your baby while he is lying on his back, does he wave his arms toward the toy?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/0/question: Does your baby sometimes try to suck, even when she’s not feeding?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/1/question: Does your baby cry when he is hungry, wet, tired, or wants to be held?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/2/question: Does your baby smile at you?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/3/question: When you smile at your baby, does she smile back?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/4/question: Does your baby watch his hands?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/5/question: When your baby sees the breast or bottle, does she seem to know she is about to be fed?
